ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T02:44:44 [Issue ID 4000-934857] urn:comicvine:4000-934857 urn:grandcomicsdatabase:issue/934857 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 17:42:59. [Issue ID 934857]
ComicInfo.Summary: The explosive, final battle for the Under Realm begins! After Lady Death’s nearly-impossible victory over Behemoth, the forces who oppose the twisted rule of Death Queen are at last united, and make preparations to strike back against the blood-thirsty conqueror. But before they can begin to formulate a strategy, Lady Death, Stigmata, Valora, and the meager forces of the rebellion come under siege from Death Queen’s incredible war-machines and a legion of flesh-eating zombie soldiers who accompanied Behemoth to their secret location. Hopelessly outnumbered and completely surrounded, Lady Death’s final fight against the insane military conquest of her own mother commences! Death Queen has plans of her own, however, as she unveils to Tormina a fail-safe, Doomsday scenario which will ensure her victory... Available with a Regular or Sultry cover by Matt Martin a Wraparound by Richard Ortiz and a retailer order incentive Art Deco covers by painter Michael Dipascale!
